name: web_fetch
description: Fetch a URL and save the content to .stencila/cache/web/. HTML is converted to Markdown with images extracted to a media directory. Other content types are saved as-is. Returns a manifest of saved files. Use read_file, grep, or glob to explore the content.

raw.description: If true, save the response body as-is without conversion. If false (default), convert HTML to Markdown and extract media assets.
